comment._content:
The pictures from Chaco are very interesting!! I am from Argentina, please upload more that I would like very much to learn about the Mennonite Mission in that region!

Thanks and hoping to see more pics!
Agustina

comment.author: 64309534@N03
comment._content: What a wonderful collection! I like very much these pictures about Chaco missions. They are a great testimony of the mennonite presence in my country. Please more Chaco photos!

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comments!  We're glad you appreciate the photos, and we will keep your interests in mind when selecting images for digitization.
